#summary Details on changeNotificationStatus() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to change the status (on/off) of a specific notification. Calling this function switches the status of the notification from _on_ to _off_ or from _off_ to _on_, depending the current status. You will no more receive notification if it is set to _off_.

For more informations about Delcampe's notifications, see [Notifications].

=== Call ===

 * syntax : changeNotificationStatus(string token, integer notificationID)

 * parameter 1 : _string_ : secret token
 * parameter 2 : _integer_ : id of the notification you want to change. Call [getNotificationSettings] to get IDs of your notifications

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : _string_  : message, giving you more information on the function call result 

 * example : 
   * array(true, 'The status of the notification is now Active!')
   * array(true, 'The status of the notification is now Inactive!')

 * notification : none

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->changeNotificationStatus($token, 12);
}
}}}
